actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to permit the mailing of lottery tickets and related matter, the broadcasting or television of lottery information, and the transportation and advertising of lottery tickets in interstate commerce, but only where the lottery is conducted by a State agency.

summary.text: Permits the mailing of lottery tickets and related matter, the broadcasting or televising of lottery information, and the transportation and advertising of lottery tickets in interstate commerce, where such lottery is conducted by a State agency or the District of Columbis acting under authority of law. (Adds 18 U.S.C. 16)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to permit the mailing of lottery tickets and related matter, the broadcasting or television of lottery information, and the transportation and advertising of lottery tickets in interstate commerce, but only where the lottery is conducted by a State agency.
